mapper.sql: id, title, keywords, describe, click, ctime, utime, catagory_id
mapper.insert:
insert into article
id,
title,
keywords,
describe,
click,
ctime,
utime,
catagory_id,
content,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{keywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{click,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

mapper.update:
update article
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
keywords = #{keywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
describe = #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
click = #{click,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ctime = #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
utime = #{utime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
catagory_id = #{catagoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update article set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, keywords = #{keywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, describe = #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, click = #{click,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ctime = #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, utime = #{utime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, catagory_id = #{catagoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update article set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, keywords = #{keywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, describe = #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, click = #{click,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ctime = #{ctime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, utime = #{utime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, catagory_id = #{catagoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
